name: @neynar/rust-sdk
description: Rust SDK to interact with Neynar APIs (https://docs.neynar.com/reference/quickstart)

scripts.build: yarn generate:api && yarn generate:hub-api && yarn fix:gen
scripts.generate:api: del-cli neynar_sdk/src/ neynar_sdk/docs/ && openapi-generator-cli generate --type-mappings='"file=Vec<u8>"' -i ./oas/src/v2/spec.yaml -g rust -o neynar-sdk
scripts.generate:hub-api: del-cli src/hub-api && openapi-generator-cli generate --type-mappings='"file=Vec<u8>"' -i ./oas/src/hub-rest-api/spec.yaml -g rust -o hubble-sdk

author: Neynar
